header_text: You are at the store getting groceries. You are having trouble picking things up off the shelf, and you accidentally drop something. A worker has to come clean up the mess, and you feel embarrassed.

elements.text: You apologize to the worker, and they reassure you that they don't mind cleaning up the mess. Knowing that they're not angry makes you feel...

elements.name: You are at the store getting groceries. You are having trouble picking things up off the shelf, and you accidentally drop something. A worker has to come clean up the mess, and you feel embarrassed._Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle_word2
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
